General.Name: China Hi-Tech Group Co Ltd
General.Description: China Hi-Tech Group Co., Ltd. engages in the education and real estate leasing businesses in China. It operates Peking University and Renmin University of China. The company's production-education integration business includes development of educational products and solutions in the field of information technology (IT) applications with majors in big data and artificial intelligence; and online vocational education business comprises online medical education that offers professional examination training business in the field of medical education. It is also involved in the sale of commercial housing units and software products, as well as provision of educational consulting services. China Hi-Tech Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.
